original_text: Their name will be ‘God's holy People’, and ‘The People that the Lord has redeemed ’. And Jerusalem's name will be ‘The City where people are happy’, and ‘The City that is full of people’. Their name will be ‘God's holy People’,
korean_text: 사람들이 너를 일컬어 거룩한 백성이라 여호와께서 구속하신 자라 하겠고 또 너를 일컬어 찾은 바 된 자요 버림 받지 아니한 성읍이라 하리라

sentences.original_text: Their name will be 'God's holy People'
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 이름은 '하나님의 거룩한 백성'이라 불릴 것

sentences.original_text: and 'The People that the Lord has redeemed'
And Jerusalem's name will be 'The City where people are happy'
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 예루살렘의 이름은 '사람들이 행복한 도시'라 불릴 것

sentences.original_text: and 'The City that is full of people'
Their name will be 'God's holy People'
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 이름은 '하나님의 거룩한 백성'이라 불릴 것
